Binding energy of a certain nucleus is 18 × 10
8 J. How much is the difference between total mass of all the nucleons and nuclear mass of the given nucleus: (1) 0.2 g (2) 20 g (3) 2 g (4) 10 g

questions.text: Paramagnetic substances: A. align themselves along the directions of external magnetic field. B. attract strongly towards external magnetic field. C. has susceptibility little more than zero. D. move from a region of strong magnetic field to weak magnetic field.
